Emily can introduce you to 10 people at Oracle
My parents told me "being an immigrant with no degree is the last position you want to be in, in this country."
So, for the past two years, I've been working to develop a skill that someone would pay for.
It took tons of sleepless nights and lonely weekends staring at a computer screens trying to figure it out.
I ran out of money multiple times during this journey and I knew the easy way out was to go back to college and do what everyone else does.
I had to Uber countless night to try to get money so that I can learn the skills I needed to get my dream job.
My parents told me that I was wasting my time countless times but I I never listened to them.
I knew what I wanted and what it takes to get it. All I had to do is step up to the plate every single day.
6 weeks ago I got a job at BAMF Media to do exactly what I want to do: Messenger Chatbots marketing.
And I did this to prove to my parents that there is more than one way to be successful in life.
Although it may take some time to figure it out, it's worth it in the end.
And I am working next to some of the smartest marketers in the world including Josh Fechter,  Houston Golden and more.
Heading to the #CWW in New Orleans this month? Meet the Monet Software Team at booth 318 to learn more about boosting your contact center and helpdesk's efficiency.
Currently working towards the Salesforce Administrator certification.https://trailhead.com/me/emilykil
Freelance graphic and website design services to small and mid-sized companies.

ClickMail is a VAR of email service providers (ESPs) for enterprise email marketing.  I manage the full sales cycle from prospecting to development to close.  I am fluent in BlueHornet and Salesforce Marketing Cloud and work primarily with ecommerce businesses that need greater ROI and visibility into their email marketing efforts.

Meraki is a wireless networking company that sells hardware as well as SaaS to manage the hardware. I first managed the sales and channel partnerships for all of Ohio and Michigan and then in New York, New Jersey, and Connecticut- President's Club- 191% annual quota attainment - #2 rep among 30+ sales reps- Promoted twice from AE to Sr. AE to Associate Regional Sales Manager

Mignonne Design is a full service website design agency I started to leverage my experience at Homestead.My responsibilities included cold calling, email marketing, project management, process development, and employee recruitment.  To help grow the business, I lived in the Philippines for 6 months recruiting and training graphic designers and developers.  Our clients were primarily marketing and PR agencies that outsourced projects to us.
Homestead is a SaaS company that offers businesses a way to make their own websites.- #1 sales rep among over 25 sales reps by a 25% margin

Working with Emily has given me a new perspective on how to be a successful salesperson.  Although her approach can be nontraditional,  Emily has a stellar track record in sales!  She has the ability to develop creative ways to be successful and she taught me that there is never one answer to a solution.  Emily showed me that if you believe in something then you should not take no for an answer.   She will fight to win business and won’t stop until she achieves her goals.   I recommend Emily to any organization that is looking for an aggressive, energetic and dedicated salesperson.

Jose Illenberger is an awesome designer and project manager. I first worked with Jose in 2007 when he was working as a website designer.  His designs are beautiful and when I look back at his work from that time period his designs still look relevant to today's design standards.  His design aesthetic is timeless.  Jose's job was to manage all of the web design and logo projects, review work for completion to the clients' specifications, and mentor the staff.  He is awesome.  He leads with understanding and compassion while at the same time setting proper boundaries when necessary.  He is particularly adept at motivating and training junior level designers to the next level of their skill set.  Supremely organized and a hard worker.  Mature and kind.  It was a pleasure working with him and I hope to have the opportunity to work with him again in the future.
